Blue Miracle.message:
Blue Miracle

"To save their cash-strapped orphanage, a guardian and his kids partner with a washed-up boat captain for a chance to win a lucrative fishing competition."

Cast: "Jimmy Gonzales, Dennis Quaid, Anthony Gonzalez, Bruce McGill, Raymond Cruz, Nathan Arenas, Miguel Angel Garcia, Isaac Arellanes, Steve Gutierrez, Dana Wheeler-Nicholson, Fernanda Urrejola, Silverio Palacios"

Director: Julio Quintana

Released in: 2021

Duration: 97 min

You could also like: GLOW UP

Same Kind of Different as Me.message:
Same Kind of Different as Me

A wealthy couple whose marriage is on the rocks befriends a local homeless man who changes their perspectives in this inspiring true story.

Cast: "Greg Kinnear, Renée Zellweger, Djimon Hounsou, Jon Voight, Olivia Holt"

Director: Michael Carney

Released in: 2017

Duration: 120 min

You could also like: MARVEL ANIME: WOLVERINE
